Articles.Content: So I got my friends save file, and when we loaded up the game and entered the VAB and SPH, all the parts were missing. I have no idea how this happened, please help
crafts files are in a separate folder Ships\[sPH|VAB]. Are you just copying the .sfs save file but didn't copy the Ships folder?

Please describe exactly how you put the save file in your install before opening it.

When you say "all the parts were missing" do you literally mean all the parts, as in there are zero parts available to build with?
